SEARCH
Package manager

Class TutionManager

java.lang.Object
manager.TutionManager
public class TutionManager extends Object
Tuition manager class is the class that takes commands from the user and performs the necessary action on the roster and enrollment object based on the command entered. This class calls necessary methods from different classes to perform its operations.
Author:
Raghunandan Wable, Srikumar Avirneni

  • Method Details

    • input

      private void input(String inputText)
      Takes the input from main method, parses the command from input. Based on the entered command calls necessary helper method in other class or in same class that execute the command.
      Parameters:
      inputText - a line of text entered by user in terminal taken in by scanner

    • finalAddPrint

      public void finalAddPrint()
      The method prints the students in the enrollment array after adding thee enrolled credits to total credits.

    • printWithTuition

      public void printWithTuition()
      Prints student enrollment array along with tuition

    • validAmount

      public boolean validAmount(String userInput)
      The method checks if the amount entered is valid or not and returns true or false.
      Parameters:
      userInput - the amount entered by user.
      Returns:
      false if the amount entered is not valid otherwise true.

    • updateScholarship

      public void updateScholarship(String inputText)
      The method updates scholarship for the enrolled student.
      Parameters:
      inputText - the value that needs to be added to the scholarship.

    • correctCredits

      public boolean correctCredits(EnrollStudent student)
      The method checks if the credits entered match the number of credits based on residency status.
      Parameters:
      student - the credits of student that needs to be verified if they are valid or not.
      Returns:
      true if number of credits is valid otherwise false.

    • enrollStudent

      public void enrollStudent(String inputText)
      Method enrolls the student into enrollment array if it is valid and doesn't preexist.
      Parameters:
      inputText - The input value of a student that needs to be added.

    • dateCheck

      private boolean dateCheck(Date date)
      Checks if the date of birth entered by user is valid or is not too young.
      Parameters:
      date - the date entered by user that needs to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if date is valid, false otherwise.
